name: Color Sneak
description:
Concept

The game was made by 4 people working each 2 days on it in turn. The first one, start a Unity project and has 2 days to add any feature he want. Then the next one received this project has is and need to continue it without any explanation for 2 days. and it continue for each participant, then the last one finish it.

Participant in order

Forest

Valou Tout Seul

Kralatos

Vikain
